entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 54 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
